overview: At last, Colin's hit album God Rock comes to life on DVD! Rock on with the band, head bush with Survival Man, watch Colin and Masterchef winner Kate Bracks battle it out on Super Chef, cheer the underdogs in God United and pull some sick skate moves as you Kick It! Flip It!  Sing along with Colin as he brings deep truths from God's Word to his craziest, funniest, catchiest DVD yet. (And keep an eye out for Colin's puppet pal, Nudge! He keeps popping up!)  Bonus features include Behind the Scenes, Outakes and Funnies, an exclusive "Making of..." slideshow and a peek at Colin's UK video scrapbook!
title: God Rock
